title-group.article-title: Simultaneous Reduction of Soot and NOₓ in Diesel Engines by Homogeneous Catalysis of Group Platinum Metals

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1990 Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: Simultaneous reduction of soot and NOₓ can be achieved in diesel engines by the introduction of group platinum metals into the combustion chemistry. An aftermarket emissions control technique has been developed for on-highway and stationary applications of diesel engines providing significant reductions of soot and NOₓ during transient and steady-state test cycles.
